profile.profileName: [New Museum for Contemporary Art, New York, NY, USA] Multimedia digital archive
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for use as an archive for images, documents, video and audio programs. It is intended for use by the New Museum for Contemporary Art in New York, USA (http://www.newmuseum.org)

label.name: Description (public)
label.description: Narrative description for public display. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item.

label.name: Description (archival/internal)
label.description: Detailed narrative description for internal use only. This is the primary text used to document the item.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Credit text
label.description: Text to display as credit line for object.

label.name: Copyright text
label.description: Text to display as copyright line for object.

label.name: Materials used
label.description: Materials used in object.

label.name: Store links
label.description: URL of related item in Museum store.

label.name: Languages
label.description: Language used in the resource.

label.name: Audiences
label.description: Audience this resource is appropriate for.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item for internal use only. These notes should not be publicly displayed.

label.name: Exhibition type
label.description: Brief text indicating the type of exhibition

label.name: Program type
label.description: Brief text indicating the type of program

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: List alternate identifiers here. These are alphanumeric codes used at some point to identify the object which are no longer employed.

label.name: Location description
label.description: Narrative description of item location. The location of an item should be recorded using the storage location hierarchy. This narrative field is a hold-over from the earlier CollectiveAccess 0.5x system and will eventually be removed.

label.name: Image format
label.description: Record the original format of the image here.

label.name: Classification
label.description: Indicates from which area of activity the object originates.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Dimensions
label.description: Physical dimensions of object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Type
label.description: The type of measurement this is.

label.name: Dimensions (as text)
label.description: Dimensions entered as text for display. This field exists to allow import of dimensions written as text in the old Excel spreadsheets.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Institution
label.description: Name of the institution to which the collection belongs.

label.name: Alternate publication numbers
label.description: List alternate publication numbers (ISBN

label.name: Alternate publication numbers
label.description: List alternate publication numbers (ISBN
